website_summaries.verdict: The sturdy build makes these standout from many other models. They take a much heavier weight load and look good doing it.
pros: Made of plastic, making them lightweight and easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: Great for fellowship and therapy groups
customer_reviews.text: It's $10 a chair. So can't expect much. We bought our first 20 in August 2014 for a fellowship group and it is almost 2 years now and they're holding up well. Only problem is if you let coffee sit on it too long it leaves indelible stains. Also, these chairs get dirty easy. We've had some large folks sit on them and they've held up. So besides the dirt issue, they're space-saving and great for groups.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Demeanor

customer_reviews.title: Durable...just make sure all the fasteners are in place before using.
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly sturdy, comfortable, and lightweight. My only complaint is that three of the chairs were missing the fasteners on the same one side of the metal panel underneath seat that covers the bar that slides when you open it. The pictures I’ve uploaded show the three chairs missing the fasteners and one to show what they should look like.
customer_reviews.author: mmwin10

customer_reviews.title: Good solid chair.
customer_reviews.text: Great way investment. I get tired of borrowing or renting chairs, so I bought these. They are NOT metal chairs, but they are still sturdy and can hold a lot of weight. I know someone over 300 and the chair held her without any problems. Tip: When the chair is folded, there is no space to slip your hand through, to carry several at one time...just dip the chair upside down and carry several that way. 2 When closing the chairs up, kick the back legs of the chai inwards. For some reason they are hard to fold close, using the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Msro

customer_reviews.title: LOVED these chairs
customer_reviews.text: LOVED these chairs... I don't know why I thought they were going to be all metal...the seat and the back are a hard plastic....they were GREAT....and comfortable....they are not too heavy either--I was really worried about that. They stack up great in the garage out of the way...I will have many uses for these in the coming years.... Only one complaint---I didn't get enough -- I will have to get me some more.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: great for even shower use
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. It is a folding chair. For what it is, I purchased this to use in the shower after I injured my back in a car accident and am waiting on surgery (I am unable to stand for more then a couple of minutes especially without assistance). So I was looking for something that was not expensive that I could use after I am healed. This chair seems to have met those needs. Since I use it in the shower all the time, it is showing no rust and folds relatively easily (since everyone else does not need it, we fold it to get it out of the way).
customer_reviews.author: B. Staples

customer_reviews.title: Very good, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a professional cinematographer, and when you go on organized productions, you need a small table and chairs. I have 4 of these and they stay in the box they came in. I put it on my dolly, along with my portable slim table, and I'm on my way. I had to do interviews the other day, I popped all of them out of the box, and had one for the interviewee, and 3 for others to sit around on. I'm a 300 pound guy and these chairs didn't even flinch.
customer_reviews.author: reifnawss

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but tough!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect affordable chair. Well built with extra reinforcement on the seat to make it a secure choice. Purchased as a shower chair for an invalid. Shower too small for a standard ADA chair and this works great. Even the physical therapist was impressed with the quality for an inexpensive chair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much out there to compare it to. Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: The weight limit is definitely suspect. I'm 170 lbs and the chair creaks and shifts under my weight. I've never had a folding chair do that before. Also in person it looks geriatric. I just bought this for a backup while I'm buying furniture for my house. Between the weakness of it, and the style I'll have to replace it. Update- Decided to up my review a star to 4. After a few months of using it it's settled in a bit and quit shifting. I like the white contrast to all my antique furniture. I think I can make it work. Planning to buy a few more for dinner parties.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for a pack of ten. We use these for the occasional large get together so people can sit outside on the deck during a BBQ. The rest of the time they are relegated to garage duty, where they hold up fine. Easy to pack against the wall. Once, even against my better judgement, I stood on one to reach a high shelf. I am not a small man, and the chair did not buckle or break.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for Family Get Together s, dinners, etc. they are extremely durable, comfortable for a folding chair, balanced, and store easily! I used to borrow chairs and banquet tables from my office, it was a lot of work to drive over, pack up tables and 20 chairs bring to the house and then the following day return everything to the office. I decided to search banquet tables and chairs and am so very happy I did! Everyone stated the chairs were comfortable, all sat balanced on the floor, could not be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: YorkieMomX4

customer_reviews.title: Chair assassin approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for folding chairs for awhile. You'll be hard pressed to find a better deal with the stability these chairs have. They are solid which was surprising for how lightweight they are. My husband considers himself a professional chair tester due to his size at 300# and even he didn't have anything bad to say. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: lightweight and durable. used these for Diner en Blanc and our's was in the grass -didn't sink into the ground when we sat on them, and light enough to carry through the DC metro and streets.
customer_reviews.author: DinDin63

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid build and cheap price. What else could you want.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair to use as an an aid in utilizing a small pedaling exercise apparatus that mimics the workout you get on a bicycle. I am a big guy weighing about 280 lbs. and this chair is rock solid.I also use it as a computer chair when I'm using my tablet. It stows away easily and cost less than folding chairs with nowhere near this one's strength or weight capacity. I imagine that I'll have this chair for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF COX

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 recieved 1
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these and only recieved one, but the Amazon chat person quickly organised to send out the missing chair. My 3 star review is for the chair though. They say 800lb but no way would I put that much on there. Im 280 and when I sit on it the plastic base is very flexible at the rear, which makes you feel like it may collapse and the metal frame has a small about of movement. I dont think it will collapse because of the way the frame is manufactured, but it is a little unsettling when you first sit on it. I wouldnt recommend it to anyone too much heavier than me.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Coop

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: Solid little chair, and the price is unbeatable. No assembly required - just unfold and go! It's lightweight, small, and unassuming, but it's also really sturdy. Was originally going to use as a placeholder chair for my little apartment desk, but it looks better in my set up than I expected so I'm going to continue using this but with a seat cushion to make it more comfortable for longer sessions. Really easy to fold up and move out of the way if I need more space, and it takes up so little room when folded up that I just slide it behind my fridge and it's like it isn't even there.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of purchasing these chairs at first because let's be real the pictures of the chairs don't look very convincing of supporting 800lb. Hopefully I will never have to test out the max weight limitations of these chairs but at 250 lb these chairs sit very comfortably. I did lots of side to side movements and legs off the ground tests while sitting in these chairs and they didn't budge. At 6 feet tall these chairs sit standard height off the ground. I will purchase more of these chairs in the future now that I am confident that they will support friends and family during our large events.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nicholas B. Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Solid chairs that are light, good looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a family gathering of 26 expected this Christmas and I found myself about 14 chairs short. These chairs are solid and they look great. I bought the brown chairs because they were around $12 a chair, but I now know this neutral color Is my preference. These look like they will last forever. Improvement idea- built in handle would be great for moving a few at a time. Cushions are nice, however our other folding chairs with cushions have torn. These chairs obviously won’t have that issue.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Got My Chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once as of ...well...this very moment in time. More comfortable than my other plastic chair ... really, noticeably more. Easy to fold, unlike my other plastic chair. Doesn't take up a lot of space. It seems a little heavier than my other plastic chair, which is really light, but, who cares! Like the color. Really liked the price. uumm...but... i didn't at all like the fact that the UPS delivery dude didn't follow delivery instructions. of course, that was NOT AMAZON'S fault. bottom line: GLAD I GOT MY CHAIR!!! glad i got this chair. feeling like it's going to last...4eva! Aaaahhhhh AMAZON!!!! I LOVE THIS COMPANY (& Jeff Bezos)!!!
customer_reviews.author: FromBeToReality

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, they seemed small until I sat on one...
customer_reviews.text: They are great and I love that they stack together so tightly. All ten of these stacked tighter that a neighbors 4 lifetime brand plastic chairs we borrowed. When the box got there I thought "Oh cr*p, these are gonna suck". I was completely wrong and totally surprised. I would definitely buy again if I had a use for 20 chairs. I may just buy an extra set to have on hand to loan to the neighbors. Yes, they are that good. Again, they seemed small but I measured the seat height....same as others we borrowed. The back is a little shorter than others but still hits in a good spot for support.
customer_reviews.author: Gr

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs great price.. happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. Awesome for the price. I will Be looking to purchase another set.. keeps me from having to rent chairs for the same price I can Buy them.. I was Slightly nervous with shipping as I ordered It on a Monday with guaranteed 2 day shipping but it didn’t show up until that Saturday morning.. I was one happy momma seeing those chairs at my door the day of my 2 year olds birthday party, they are sturdy, easy to fold and put away. I love Them will defiantly purchase more from this seller.. 😊
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Came broken. No apparent remediation.
customer_reviews.text: The chair came with a broken backrest. Tried to go through the website for a refund, and it ends in a dead-end when it asks me to create an account, then doesn't let me (says "email not found"--I know; that's why I was trying to create an account...). So I threw away $15 by buying this thing. A note--even if it hadn't been broken, it would have been an incredibly uncomfortable chair. The design is not one that supports a sitting human in the right position. Fine for sitting if you only want to do so for a few minutes, but any longer than that and it's worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Lauraness

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by how sturdy this is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another plastic folding chair that had become warped/less stable after a few months of regular use. Not only did this come in a color I love, but even more importantly, the bottom of this chair is reinforced with a metal plate and rows of screws and is EXTREMELY sturdy. I'm not sure if this chair could hold 800 lbs as claimed, but two people have used mine at once and it supported the ~350 lbs easily.
customer_reviews.author: MD92

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic banquet chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are light-weight, standard chairs, great for outdoors, banquets, etc. They are a little stiff to fold up, but by standing on the bottom back bar and pulling up on the chair, folding is quick and easy (many people haven't tried this trick!) I thought they'd bend more when sitting on them, but found this not to be true - thankfully they're more comfortable than what others have said. Very happy with these and think they will last quite awhile!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The seat's a little small.
customer_reviews.text: Folding chairs I purchased from shops in town broke pretty easily, including the metal ones. I'm plus sized and have plus sized family members, so needed a chair that would really stand up to the task. This chair works great. It's the perfect height too and feels very sturdy. No fear of this thing breaking out from under you. My only complaint would be that the seat is a little small, especially is you have a butt. It's a bit narrow and shallow. If they could widen them and deepen the seat a bit it would much better. However, it's still a very good folding chair and is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Everything and more that you want in a folding chair...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. Sturdy, hold you up well. We purchased 20 for a yearly party we throw and were not disappointed. They live up to folding chair standards! I actually think these are more comfortable than the ones sold at Home Depot, so I was very pleased. Only "gripe" is that they are stiff to fold up, but will probably ease after multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: eking_sslobo

customer_reviews.title: For occasional use only
customer_reviews.text: First the pros, it is a good manageable size that can be tucked away out of sight and out of mind. it's very sturdy and seems to hold a lot of weight. Even with that, it's pretty light weight. Now the cons, Its been getting more and more difficult to fold up. it's not the most comfortable, in particular, I am referring to the back of the chair. you can feel it on the spine as the support ends at the middle of the back.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob RP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and look nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought 30 of these because over the long haul it beats renting. They are quality chairs, look nice, and stack perfectly. They not are not super comfortable but that is to be expected for this type of chair and since they are not for daily use it is not a problem. Their main purpose in our case is to take them out every few weeks for pool parties etc. Great delivery and service. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: PaulABQ

customer_reviews.title: Great value for folding chairs. Stack in a small footprint.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy to buy this 10-piece chair set. It’s a good solid basic plastic folding chair. Can’t beat the bang for buck. The chairs are not spectacular by any mean but they are decently comfortable and very sturdy. My favorite part of this set is that the chairs stack very narrowly against each other so the footprint for all 10 chairs is surprisingly small. Makes storing them in my crowded garage much more feasible.
customer_reviews.author: HKY

customer_reviews.title: Really great buy
customer_reviews.text: So I received the 10 pack of chairs. I checked each one and did sit on them. All rivets and hinges were perfect. I'm 6 foot 220 lbs and these chairs did not budge. There is an incline that makes one sit back making it very comfortable. I threw water on the chair noting that there are drain holes in the rear seat area. The water drained right off. I will update on the leg covers on the bottom but as of now I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R.Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids....not for plus sized adults
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact nature of these chairs, but I don't believe the 800 lb. rating that the seller puts on these. We bought a 10-pack for use around the house, but then returned them because they seem kinda flimsy. I was afraid my guests might break them and fall, and I didn't want the liability. Decided to buy some from COSTCO instead (they were about the same price, and a whole lot sturdier). If you are going to use them for kids or light adults, these seem fine. Otherwise, I think it is best to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: 0j0b7

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these chairs because of their higher weight capacity. I wanted everyone who comes over to feel comfortable and I’ve had more flimsy folding chairs collapse- even under children who throw themselves into their seat with force. These have been sturdy and solid so far (it’s been about 5 months). I really enjoy the extra seating and once I figured out how to collapse them (press your foot on the bottom bar while you pull in), they folded easily as well. They are delivered in a very heavy box, but here easy to unpack.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to store for the few times a year you need extra seating!
customer_reviews.text: We had ordered these type before & they are just what we wanted and a fair price. They fold quickly & easily but you have to intentionally fold them (helpful to prevent accidents!). They are sturdy enough for the larger individual (probably not for a long afternoon but great for a meal and game time!). I also chose this style for their easy cleanup and the black avoids showing any scuffs that will normally occur stacking, moving, hauling, etc. We now have 40 and Thanksgiving & gatherings are much easier now! I just pack them back to the garage, carrying 4/time (two folded in each hand). : )
customer_reviews.author: busymom

customer_reviews.title: Had 30 in attendance and these were great! Easy enough to pick up and set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought these just in time for our Thanksgiving dinner. Had 30 in attendance and these were great! Easy enough to pick up and set up, as well as fold up and put away. They are light-weight yet comfy. Even for larger family members (and we have a couple big ones!). No complaints. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JLD

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs and Very Economical
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are exactly as described - nice looking, easy to set-up, sturdy and comfortable. Needed extra chairs for baby shower and holiday parties. Description and reviews on line plus the price was better than any I found locally in stores. An added nicety was that each chair has its own plastic sleeve covering it which keeps it clean and prevents it from getting scratched when stored. There were quite a few large guests at the party and everyone found the chairs comfortable and secure. Of course I could have spent way more money for padded, fancier chairs but for the occasional party these are a great deal. Would recommend them to family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: L McHale

customer_reviews.title: Quality, value and fold up really flat.
customer_reviews.text: We used to rent these every year for family Thanksgiving and Christmas. These chairs are perfect and store flat. Invest and never rent again
customer_reviews.author: leza B.

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for lots of weight, not for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Probably my most unpopular chairs in my studio. The good thing is that they are supposed to hold a lot of weight, however the seat isn’t quite wide enough to seat a person that this chair should accommodate. Not real comfy for anyone. And...very squeaky, which would only draw attention to any large people occupying the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cox

customer_reviews.title: hercules white folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: I needed chairs I could hose off after seafood boils... these fit the bill as they do NOT have cushioned/padded seats. The backs and seats are plastic. My husband is a big guy (300 lbs) and he sits comfortably and securely (not wobbly) in these. They are bright white, as pictured. The frames are metal, but painted with rubber foot tips. I expect these chairs to last a very long time, however, I never hesitate to update my reviews if new information seems useful.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Big chonky boy here!
customer_reviews.text: I am a little over 280 pounds and this is a very sturdy chair. I would suggest buying a booty pillow though. Ive had this chair for 1 year and its still going stronger than my last relationship.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Price.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but the box these chairs come in is so flimsy that many of caps on the feet of the chairs were broken. Had to order extra box and return chairs with broken caps. The chairs themselves are very nice and sturdy not too small nor are they extremely large making them easy to store. I bought these for my Daughter’s Sweet Sixteen and will be using them again for graduation and many future parties.
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: Great for hefty folks. No, seriously, it is.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie. I was very skeptical about this chair - it looks kinda flimsy, and I'm by no means small. I figured it was cheap enough I'd risk it. Glad I did! This sucker is STRONG. I use it in the house when needed, and outside as well - no issues - it holds up really well. The only complaint I've got is that it takes a good amount of strength to close it back up. It helps if you turn it upside down and close the legs - that's easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Cooper

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for those temporary seating needs during the holidays
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how small the box of 10, they were shipped in, was. The purchase price at the time was XLNT! Delivery was SUPER SPEEDY. The chairs were super easy to set up, and after fiddling with them after use, I got the hang of it and also easy to put away. I kept the box as for convenient storage and keep them clean. VERY STURDY TOO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Garry T

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little weak.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 320lbs and the first time I sat in the chair it got a stress mark on it. I'm a bit disappointed. The dimensions are close to or the same as other types of folding chairs. It's my fault I didn't check the dimensions, but I had hoped the chair would be slightly more generous.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie Paige Darling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are excellent they hold up well to heavy weight for real. They are sturdy and easy to clean. They're even comfortable chairs. I've used them for multiple occasions. They are an excellent choice. The chairs fold well, once you figure out how to get them down of course the first time is a challenge. That was the hard part for us, lol.
customer_reviews.author: tall2pretty

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: We have a big party at our house every year. We often borrow chairs from a local church. But, that wasn't going to work this year and I got tired of hauling chairs back and forth. I came very close to purchasing some cheaper chairs in order to save a few bucks. But, these "looked" better and I thought let's spend a little extra to get something we think will be reliable and safe. These chairs are really good. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: coffeedave

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully white!
customer_reviews.text: Part of the reason I bought this chair is for a friend that weighs about 400lbs. plus, I set it on my little "patio" made of red brick and surrounded by white rocks. I wanted the chair to match it. It is solid white everywhere and I was happy with that. It's been rained on several times, but isn't difficult to clean and/or fold back up. Plan to purchase another when I make my patio area larger...
customer_reviews.author: Alethea Downing

customer_reviews.title: Very safe
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and strong chairs. The only downside is that they are super extra safe. So when you open them, they "click" into a sort of semi-locked position. Overall it's a good feature, it means the chairs won't fold on their own. But if you look for chairs that you will open and close all the time, this safety mechanism may become a bit too cumbersome. I still love them, they are very comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: lagrandegiraffe

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs for the price. Sturdy, but light. Look somewhat cheap, but sturdier than they look. And they stack into a tiny space. Thought I would have to make space in my garage, but they easily slid onto the floor of a closer with a low self. Saves me having to carry them up stairs. I am happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for extra Thanksgiving seating. The chairs are sturdy, lock open, and are actually comfortable. For some weird reason, the adults ended up using these and there were no complaints after the feast. I recommend them and, should the need arise, would be happy to buy another set at the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Saucier

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are o.k. for my granddaughters to sit on. I honestly don't think that it holds someone that is heavy. I weigh over 200 pounds and was comfortable sitting on them when they are flimsy. You fill as though they may collapse so you have to sit gingerly upon them. I should have bought Home Depots folding chairs they are superior to these chairs even if they are $20.00 a piece.
customer_reviews.author: barbra

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HOLD 800 POUNDS
customer_reviews.text: Well, less than two years and it bent by the hinges. My 13 year old son uses it, or I should say used it to sit at his desk for homework. He’s nowhere near 800 lbs. Guess why they have a five year warranty for 5 bucks but the chair doubled in price. Waste of money. If you’re a large person do not purchase this chair. Into La garbage it goes.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy chair will not hold 800 pounds
customer_reviews.text: This chair is described as having an 800 pound weight limit. This chair is very flimsy; 800 pounds would fold this like a cheap suit. Also the back of the chair hits your spine in just that place to make it uncomfortable. Typically I don't write negative reviews but this product is described incorrectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Seringer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Solid, & Competitive Pricing - 2 arrived broken though.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are comfortable, solid, and are priced competitively. They had no problem supporting the max weight of a 250lb person at my event. The only issue I had is that 2 chairs arrived broken; I ordered 2 ten packs. Out of the 20 chairs, of course my father-in-law chose the broken one and busted his ass.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N. Strusser, MS

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful chair
customer_reviews.text: I am 230 lbs and I was very skeptical to put my full weight on this seemingly flimsy thing. But I put it to the test by standing on it and sure enough it held me easily. So the fact that it is small may be a good or bad thing for your but for me it's good because it doesn't take up much space to store. Combined with the fact it easily supports a big guy like me it is perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these chairs for a birthday party and loved them! They are easy to fold and are really sturdy. I like how they looked as well because they were such good quality and I liked the white color. They were so good in fact they these would work amazing for formal events like an outdoor wedding. They were comfortable to sit in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Hercules is a fitting name!
customer_reviews.text: I come from a large family, in more ways than one. These are lightweight and easy to use. I've had issues in the past with chairs not holding up to their claim, but not these. We had no problems at all during a pretty long graduation party for my son. I recommend these to anybody looking for a quality folding chair.
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: Great folding chairs. Better than the others
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are well made. The seat and the back are hard strong plastic and the legs and base are solid metal with metal rivets. It's easy to get open but hard to close up... Which is excellent so I don't have to worry about it folding up on me. Its good to use as a walker if you are disabled and need a chair walker. I would try this. If you can lift 5-10 lbs. It doesn't feel like it weighs that much.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good enough !
customer_reviews.text: Well it says can hold up to 800 pounds and so far they can hold my father-in-law so I guess they can hold that much weight . Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: In the broad spectrum of unreliable places to sit, ...
customer_reviews.text: In the broad spectrum of unreliable places to sit, the HERCULES chair triumphantly reminds the squatter than it can hold 4 times that of the average human weight upon it's tiny legs. For all your large friends; there may never be seesaws, but there can be HERCULES.
customer_reviews.author: P. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Hercules lives up to its name
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Hercules chair. I've had the other one for over a year and loved it so much that I bought another one. I leave it outdoors year round (a tarp over it in winter) and it still looks great. It's a strong comfortable chair. My order arrived in perfect condition with no assembly needed. I will definitely order from Flash Furniture again.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Wow way better than the price infers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these with limited expectations considering the price tag. At unboxing I was equally underwhelmed, however I used these during a bible study and used one myself they are well constructed and comfortable as much as folding chair can be. I’m a restless person and this chair wasn’t excessively noisy and felt quite sturdy. Asking the others that used them, the sentiment was unanimous.
customer_reviews.author: Chan1689

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large family get-togethers!
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs!! I bought 2 packs, for 20 total chairs, as I have a large family and needed more chairs for the parties we have. I was tired of renting chairs!! I received quickly, and the chairs so far have been great! Seem really sturdy, great construction, and fold up pretty flat - so that makes them easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: AutumnSecret

customer_reviews.title: Colorful but Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought a red and a blue chair. Folds nicely but is hard! Got some really nice cushions that help. Was going to return them but once I got the cushions, it changed my mind. The color and form is just as pictured. Is nicer looking than those bulky beige institutional chairs
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy n spacious chairs ( no arms). Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are solid. Color is nice. Purchased blue. Had a friend who is about 400 lbs visit one afternoon. She sat comfortably in these chairs. The good thing is that these folding chairs have no arms n that left her with a lot of space. Pleased with sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Butter

customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to use this channel, but there is no actual way to contact and reach the warehouse. I ordered one chair, and I received 10 in its place. I looked at my bank account, I was only charged for one. I am reaching out, because somebody probably wants the other nine chairs back. Please feel free to contact me to resolve this.
customer_reviews.author: CSPF

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. Will be back to buy some more. They do come in the original box. Since it was in the original box it did arrive super damaged. The chairs were poking out. But chairs were perfect. Easy to fold and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice chair
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? It's lightweight yet strong, it folds easily and, when folded, is thinner than a lot of other chairs, so it takes less space to store. I'm a large person, and I had no trouble sitting on it for several hours, and, with the 800-lb weight rating, didn't worry at all about it collapsing, bending, or giving me any other trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kailhofer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched and damaged and feel flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter's baby shower and SIX of ten chairs arrived permanently scratched with black marks across the top and two had scratches on the seat. The chairs feel flimsy when you sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beals at JoyFilledDays blog

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for BBQ parties I would not suggest these chairs for a long dinner party or for holidays as they really aren't that comfortable (don't be cheap people buy a nice folding chair ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6 and they all came in the same box. Not a fan of the three small holes on the seat but whatever these are cheap. Ordered for BBQ parties I would not suggest these chairs for a long dinner party or for holidays as they really aren't that comfortable (don't be cheap people buy a nice folding chair with a cushion for those events). Could see these working for a wedding reception on a lawn too as you only sit for the ceremony and reception, so maybe an hour - hour and a half the whole night?
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Very study and durable
customer_reviews.text: for the money you can't beat them. I'm 320 lbs, and no problem what so ever. I sit in one chair every week for house church, and the other one I use several days a week in my prayer closet. no problems at all. And yes, they do have drainage holes. For what....I don't want to think about.
customer_reviews.author: S6GUNNER

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were the same used by the rental company we used for my daughter's wedding. I bought the extra for her to keep for other events. It was a wonderful investment. They also fit inside each other to take up less space. Great advantage!
customer_reviews.author: tanya l neill

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than anticipated but they are light-weight and work fine. My family isn’t excessively big (height-wise or weight-wise) so these work fine. The material is plastic and the frame is aluminum, I think. They fold up for easy storage. Once my in-laws try them (6’+/200lbs+), I’ll update the review haha.
customer_reviews.author: YfromTX

customer_reviews.title: Love that. Adults were sitting in them with no ...
customer_reviews.text: They come already assembled and ready to use. They are comfy for a fold out chair. They are lower to the ground than a normal chair. But they work. Very light. Love that. Adults were sitting in them with no problems. I priced around at a bunch of places. For the quantity and quality this was a good deal. Glad I purchased them. Used them twice and still no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are not very sturdy, so I am very unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the chairs for additional seating. Even though the weight capacity says over 300 pounds, that’s not true. I had people about 150 to 200 pounds got out of the chairs and said they felt like the chairs were breaking. This is very embarrassing and feel very in uncomfortable for myself or anyone to sit in the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: I really like the chairs, they are comfortable and well made. Some are not as sturdy as other and rock on flat surfaces. This is probably due to the poor shipping. Came in a very thin box that was open on all sides. No major damage. Some scratches especially on the legs of the chairs. Not worth sending back especially because I need them for a party next weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy chairs
customer_reviews.text: It's not as bulky as the cheaper chairs I seen and sat on. I'm not sure if it actually holds up to 800lbs since I don't weight that much... not to say even half the capacity but the chairs are pretty strong and I don't see it bending or flexing a little with weight on it. I love the quality. It was totally worth investing in these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ostapczuk

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Had a party coming up and needed chairs so figured what a perfect time to just buy and have. We bought 20 black chairs (two sets of 10). At the end of the 3hr party my grandfather said “this chair was very comfortable”, everyone seemed to be comfy vs fidgety! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jdubyou

customer_reviews.title: they work great!
customer_reviews.text: I rent my home photography studio out for events whenever I'm not shooting and these have been awesome for months now. As I type this, I'm hosting a bridal shower, which is perhaps the 30th event I've hosted using these chairs. Not a single scratch or crack yet!
customer_reviews.author: Deacon Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy chairs - not sure about the 800lb weight capability. Seems to be exaggerated a little. I had guest who weighed 250-300lbs and they were solid! They are great looking chairs and my favorite part is they stack very well so they take little room. VERY happy with my purchase and would definitely RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Nuno Santos

customer_reviews.title: We love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs! We ordered them in time for a graduation party we were having at our house and we had so many people ask where we got them. They're very comfortable for folding chairs. And the way they are designed, we have no worries about our toddler sitting on it and causing it to fold up on him. We told everyone where to get these chairs and if we ever need more we will get these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for extra seating for holidays and picnics and such. Look nice, and appear to be pretty sturdy. I like the beige color as well. And they fold down nicely and don't take up a lot of room for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. They are comfortable and sturdy. Compact and can be stored/stacked easily out of the way. Perfect height for our card/puzzle table. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: The box arrived damaged as well as 3 chairs inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought 20 chairs (10 chairs per box) the chairs are well constructed, and good looking. One of the boxes arrived today and was damaged and 3 the chairs were damaged. I was going to return them, but I do not want to package the chairs and take this heavy box to UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo Russo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We are moving into a new place and needed somewhere to sit while getting it ready for us. These are lightweight but sturdy feeling. We will keep for occasional use in the house and holidays when there's always a need for more seating.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Clark

customer_reviews.title: Buy these! Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for Thanksgiving last year. They arrived on time, color exactly as pictured, are all still looking good, have used on patio for parties and potlucks and use in the shop when extra people show up. My husband weighs over 200 lbs and he hasn't busted one yet. The only weird thing is that to fold them up you have to turn chairs completely upside down and pull the foot rest bars together.
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: The plastic parts of the chair are very sturdy. The same can’t be said about the metal or the floor savers. Had to replace the set after four months and had to replace the floor savers after about three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Hasselhoffer91

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties inside and out!
customer_reviews.text: I plan on purchasing more. We have lots of parties at my house, and over the years ended up with different chairs, that while they look sturdy are either broken or take up too much room for storage. These chairs can hold a person, and are small enough to store.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: 650 lb?
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty sturdy, but I weigh about 220 lb and they flex quite a bit. I find it hard to believe that these chairs could handle 650 lb. We'll find out at our next company meeting if it can handle 400 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: These came in just in time! They are perfect whether in door or out door. I personally got them for events I host and they are great. We were seated for hours...comfortably! No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: bahja wells

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with these chairs. They are such a great value and much sturdier than I anticipated. They are actually a little hard to open and close and might need to loosen up a little over time.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoGal33

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs though
customer_reviews.text: I did not perform any load tests, however when I put my almost 220lb body onto a chair I feel it not likely to survive 800lb test. Nice chairs though, especially if you get them for close to 10$. Color is not red, it is rather dark pink/magenta, amazon pictures are right and take a look at mine on a carpet. Carpet is real red.
customer_reviews.author: Igor P.

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these... Small profile, light weight, stacks up great and sturdy. Only issue is that some of the chairs will get stuck as they fold back too far, therefore, needing to pry back.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA MOUA

customer_reviews.title: A great bargain on well designed and well manufactured folding chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are very good chairs for the money. They would probably hold two normal sized adults (weight-wise) and are comfortable for a folding chair. I feel that I really got my money's worth in purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Chair folded back and nearly snapped in half the first time I used it. Was sitting in this ridiculously uncomfortable chair for about 15 minutes before the back legs buckled beneath me. I'm a large guy about 250 lbs and this chair snapped like soft rubber the first time I used it! DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mars Kaine

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I love to host BBQ’s and parties of any kind. Seating was always an issue. These are perfect for us, they work for our guests and then folded right up and packed nicely into our garage. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Geer Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good for any weight
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a 500 pound male that found it comfortable for many hours. It is is secured with tubular reinforcements under the seat as well. The back is wide. A good find and price extremely reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: sister

customer_reviews.title: A real bargain! Heavy duty! Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I have several heavy duty people in my family. The cheaper chairs were breaking and had injured one of my family members. I love that it can be folded and store easy. I now have enough chairs to have a decent size party.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my painting workshops- paint wipes off easily. My only gripe is that I have to lay them on the floor in order to push the legs down to fold them up- cannot do it from standing position and cannot figure out why!
customer_reviews.author: patricia beall

customer_reviews.title: Holds weight well.
customer_reviews.text: While it holds the weight I am a heavy woman 320 when I bought this down to 280 and still holds well. It doesn't fold well and it slides on my floors when sitting down.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pilkin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs
customer_reviews.text: Bought 40 chairs and they all came in the same shipment. Great chairs, very sturdy. Arrived with no damage at all, so very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We needed inexpensive chairs in bulk for when we host events at the office. We were getting tired of renting chairs and considering the number of events we host each year, it made sense to invest in an inventory of seats. These chairs are lightweight and easy to store, but still durable enough for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Dawson

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture Hercules Series 800-Pound Premium Plastic Folding Chair, Beige
product_meta.description: Color:Beige| Size:1 PackCelebrate the holidays and social gatherings without writing "bring your own chair" on the invite. The 650 lb. Capacity Premium Beige Plastic Folding Chair is a convenient option for weddings, school functions, barbecues, game night, and catering events. Stay comfortable during social events with the gentle contour shaped seat and back. This portable folding chair is popular in the event rental industry due to its lightweight and incredible strength to hold up to 650 pounds of static weight. Additional advantages of our plastic folding chairs include: - Ready-to-use, no assembly required - - Stackable storage, chairs stack on top of one another without shifting - - Drainage holes prevent spills and rainwater from pooling - - Textured seat adds additional seating security - - Non-marring floor caps protect hard surfaced flooring - Foldable chairs provide a stress-free on-demand seating solution from group therapy sessions to indoor and outdoor corporate events. These low-maintenance party event chairs wipe down easily after luncheons. Make a smart investment by purchasing multiple plastic folding chairs for your rental business, waiting room or for the next time your company throws an Employee Appreciation Day.
feature_bullets: Invest in comfortable plastic foldable chairs to fulfill the seating needs of corporations and schools. This portable chair holds strong in the event furniture rental industry as well as in the home during holiday and social gatherings
Ergonomic seat and back, beige powder coated frame, non-marring floor glides
Commercial grade folding chair: lightweight design with an 18-gauge steel frame built to hold up to 650 lbs
Event party chair: drain holes prevent liquids from pooling, suitable for outdoor weddings and corporate events; frames not weather resistant and must be stored indoors

PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 17.5-Inch W x 18-Inch D x 31.5-Inch H | Folded Size: 17.5-Inch W x 2.5-Inch D x 38.25-Inch H | Seat Size: 15.5-Inch W x 15.5-Inch D x 17.75-Inch H | Back Size: 17.5-Inch W x 15.5-Inch H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,411 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
